Package farm

Class Farmer

java.lang.Object
farm.Player
farm.Farmer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Upgradeable
Direct Known Subclasses:
RegisteredFarmer
public class Farmer extends Player implements Upgradeable
This class represents a standard farmer.

  • Method Details

    • upgrade

      public Player upgrade()
      Description copied from interface: Upgradeable
      This method checks if the player is eligible to upgrade into the next farmer type and upgrades if the requirements are met.

      If the player is eligible, a new instance of the upgraded player is made.

      Specified by:
      upgrade in interface Upgradeable
      Returns:
      a RegisteredFarmer object derived from this object. Null otherwise.
